     Karnalyte Resources Inc. Issues Letter to Shareholders Warning of Threats to Value Creation From Self-Interested Individuals 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ISSUES LETTER TO SHAREHOLDERS WARNING OF THREATS TO VALUE CREATION FROM SELF-INTERESTED INDIVIDUALS  Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States.  Shareholders urged to vote FOR all management nominees to the Board of Directors prior to proxy vote deadline of 9:30 a.m. (Saskatoon time) on Tuesday, June 5, 2018  SASKATOON, SK (May ...
